rule: If the given word's part of speech can be determined and aligns with one of the part-of-speech tags in the alphabetical list provided, the output must include at least two of those tags concatenated with additional characters, spaces, or punctuation marks.
input: sentence: The weather is good today., word: today
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'NN', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags in the description. No rules are violated as the evaluation doesn't require knowing the input.
OK
